tool_description: Assigns appropriate classification codes from standard systems like Dewey Decimal, Library of Congress, or custom taxonomies based on content analysis and subject matter.

content_description.description: Textual description of the item's content and subject matter

classification_system.description: Target classification system: DDC, LCC, UDC, or custom

subject_headings.description: Array of existing subject headings to inform classification

material_type.description: Type of material: book, journal, manuscript, image, audio, video, dataset

confidence_threshold.description: Minimum confidence score for classification assignment (0.1-1.0)

error_messages: Insufficient content description: Provide more detailed description for accurate classification
Unsupported classification system: Use DDC, LCC, UDC, or provide custom system details
Invalid confidence threshold: Value must be between 0.1 and 1.0
Material type not recognized: Use book, journal, manuscript, image, audio, video, or dataset
Classification assignment failed: Unable to determine appropriate codes with sufficient confidence
usage: Provide content_description and classification_system to get appropriate classification codes. Include subject_headings for better accuracy, specify material_type for format-specific rules, and set confidence_threshold for result quality control.

primary_classification.description: Main classification code assigned to the item

confidence_scores.description: Confidence scores for each assigned classification

classification_labels.description: Human-readable labels for the assigned codes

suggested_subjects.description: Suggested subject headings based on classification analysis
